query: SELECT id, filegrid_id, file_id, invSup_id, invCust_id, product_id, gridNr, gridDate, quantity, quantityGross, uom, margin, marginPerc, roce, gridDateDesc, version, history, creationDate, finalCustomer_id, marginBeforeShare, marginSumWithShare, amountGrossIncomeEUR, turnoverCustomer, turnoverCustomerCurr, turnoverCustomerEUR, roceValue, vessel, eta, EPICORbookingStatus FROM staging.FILGRID
